According to Google, his new responsibilities will involve focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Eric Schmidt will also continue to act as an advisor to Page and Sergey Brin .
